/usr/local/cuda-10.0/bin/nvcc    -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/project.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/project.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/project.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/home/alvaro/Documents/Maestria/PDI/ltilib-2/lib  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib
